QuestData.Title: Clearing in the Forest
QuestData.Description: The Shao-Tien are on their heels. Most of them retreated to Winterbough Glade after their last defeat. We should press the advantage.$B$BTake the fight to these mogu in the clearing to the northwest. Let us leave them no minute of rest as long as they remain in the Vale.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 6 Shao-Tien mogu in Winterbough Glade.
